sub_title: Passionate, dedicated and driven Sales Trader and trading mentor/coach always searching for the next opportunity in the global markets while staying focused on  here and now.
summary:
Trading, markets and technology are my true passion.
My professional story is presented below, but you might as well skip it as past performance is not relevant for the future. Just spend some time reading my recommendations as they say more about me than I could tell myslef. 
- Results oriented and strongly motivated trader with many years of experience in trading EUR and local ccy debt products (from  2010 mainly eurozone government bonds -  2015-2017 - focus on BTPS- ITALY).
- Strong trading skills - experience in both calm and extremally volatile markets (including Eurozone debt crisis and Brexit)
- top market position (measured by secondary market volume / activity in CE4 EUR sovereign debt markets. Until  end of 2016 Primary Dealer in Slovakia & Slovenia with TOP5 position in secondary market activity measured by volume traded in those markets (no 3 in Slovakia in 2016).
- active trading in Eurozone Government Debt trading both prop and flow (DSL, DBR, BGB, FRTR, RAGB, RFGB, SPGB, PGB and BTPS) 
- 2015-2017 market-making of Italy (BTPS, CCTS), Spain, Slovakia, Slovenia in EUR
- leading role in servicing client flow and winning syndicated deals from CEE Issuers (ING was appointed as the lead manager of around 15 syndicated issues since 2007. Issuers: Republic of Poland, Republic of Hungary, Slovak Republic, Republic of Slovenia). 
- winning Primary Dealer status in Slovenia from 2011 (very strong position on Slovenia's secondary govt. bond market)
-  My strong secondary market position and activity contributed and helped ING in winning multiple syndicated deals from CEE inssuers accross the maturities in the years 2007-2015 - Slovakia, Slovenia, Hungary and Poland.
- currently mainly involved in statistical arbitrage (algo) strategies in FX markets -responsible for development and testing of the trading and risk management strategy based on signals generated by the statistical model.
Specialties: 
- Foreign Exchange trading
- Eurozone Government Bond Trading - core and periphery, 3Y -30Y maturities (outright, relative value and curve trading)
- CEE Debt/FI Markets (EUR and local currency) 
 - yield curve trading strategies
- Trend Following and SWING strategies
- Technical Analysis (DeMark indicators), Volume Spread Analysis (VSA)
